  • Constructor Details

    • TableViewDataServiceImpl

      public TableViewDataServiceImpl(Supplier<org.knime.core.node.BufferedDataTable> tableSupplier, String tableId, DataValueRendererFactory rendererFactory, DataValueImageRendererRegistry rendererRegistry)
      Parameters:
      tableSupplier - supplier for the table from which to obtain data
      tableId - a globally unique id; used to uniquely identify images in the renderer-registry which belong to the table supplied here
      rendererFactory - required to turn data values into text or images
      rendererRegistry - lazily supplied image content for cells that are rendered into images (cleared and filled whenever new rows are being requested, e.g., via #getTable(String[], long, int, String[], boolean, boolean, boolean)

    • TableViewDataServiceImpl

      public TableViewDataServiceImpl(Supplier<org.knime.core.node.BufferedDataTable> tableSupplier, Supplier<Set<org.knime.core.data.RowKey>> selectionSupplier, String tableId, DataValueRendererFactory rendererFactory, DataValueImageRendererRegistry rendererRegistry)
      Parameters:
      tableSupplier - supplier for the table from which to obtain data
      selectionSupplier - provides the currently selected rows, can be null
      tableId - a globally unique id; used to uniquely identify images in the renderer-registry which belong to the table supplied here
      rendererFactory - required to turn data values into text or images
      rendererRegistry - lazily supplied image content for cells that are rendered into images (cleared and filled whenever new rows are being requested, e.g., via #getTable(String[], long, int, String[], boolean, boolean, boolean))

  • Method Details

    • getTable

      public Table getTable(String[] columns, long fromIndex, int numRows, String[] rendererIds, boolean updateDisplayedColumns, boolean forceClearImageDataCache, boolean trimColumns, boolean showOnlySelectedRows)
      Specified by:
      getTable in interface TableViewDataService
      Parameters:
      columns - the names of the columns that are to be displayed
      fromIndex - index of the first row
      numRows - number of rows to get
      rendererIds - indicates the renderer to be used per column; can contain null-values (or be null altogether) in which case the default renderer is being used
      updateDisplayedColumns - if true, the given columns will be partitioned by being columns in the table. The missing ones are filtered out and yield a warning. An exception is only thrown if all columns are missing.
      forceClearImageDataCache - forces to clear the image data cache
      trimColumns - restricts the number of columns from which data is loaded
      showOnlySelectedRows - restricts the shown rows to the ones that are selected
      Returns:
      the table

    • getFilteredAndSortedTable

      public Table getFilteredAndSortedTable(String[] columns, long fromIndex, int numRows, String sortColumn, boolean sortAscending, String globalSearchTerm, String[][] columnFilterValue, boolean filterRowKeys, String[] rendererIdsParam, boolean updateDisplayedColumns, boolean updateTotalSelected, boolean forceClearImageDataCache, boolean trimColumns, boolean showOnlySelectedRows)
      Specified by:
      getFilteredAndSortedTable in interface TableViewDataService
      Parameters:
      columns - the names of the columns that are to be displayed
      fromIndex - index of the first row
      numRows - number of rows to get
      sortColumn - the name of the column on which to sort
      sortAscending - the direction of the sorting
      globalSearchTerm - search term that applies to all columns
      columnFilterValue - specific filters for each column
      filterRowKeys - if row keys should be considered when filtering
      rendererIdsParam - indicates the renderer to be used per column; can contain null-values (or be null altogether) in which case the default renderer is being used
      updateDisplayedColumns - if true, the given columns will be partitioned by being columns in the table. The missing ones are filtered out and yield a warning. An exception is only thrown if all columns are missing.
      updateTotalSelected - if true, the current selected rows are loaded and the number of rows in the returned total table which are selected is returned
      forceClearImageDataCache - forces to clear the image data cache
      trimColumns - restricts the number of columns from which data is loaded
      showOnlySelectedRows - if true, only show the currently selected rows
      Returns:
      the table

    • getTotalSelected

      public Long getTotalSelected()
      Specified by:
      getTotalSelected in interface TableViewDataService
      Returns:
      the current number of selected rows in the last cached filtered table

      Specified by:

    • getCopyContent

      public TableViewDataService.HTMLAndCSV getCopyContent(TableViewDataService.SpecialColumnConfig rowIndexConfig, TableViewDataService.SpecialColumnConfig rowKeyConfig, boolean withHeaders, String[] dataColumns, int fromIndex, int toIndex) throws IOException
      Description copied from interface: TableViewDataService
      A method receiving a representation of a selected rectangle of cells in the frontend which is invoked when these are copied.
      Specified by:
      getCopyContent in interface TableViewDataService
      Parameters:
      rowIndexConfig - the config of the rowIndex column
      rowKeyConfig - the config of the rowKey column
      withHeaders - whether the column headers should be copied
      dataColumns - the names of the selected columns
      fromIndex - the index of the first row which is partially selected (within the filtered table)
      toIndex - the index of the last row which is partially selected (within the filtered table)
      Returns:
      the original content of the cells as spreadsheet-readable formatted String
      Throws:
      IOException - when an I/O error occurs during conversion to csv format.
